---
description: Brainstorm MVP ideas with the idea generator agent
agent: idea-generator
---

# Ideate

Help me brainstorm and discover compelling one-hour MVP ideas.

Ask me questions about:
- What areas interest me (productivity, games, data viz, etc.)
- My goals (fun, portfolio, startup, learning)
- My comfort level with React
- Any constraints or preferences

Then generate 3-5 concrete ideas and help me choose the best one to build.
